com.droidcare.control

Class AlarmSetter

  • Object
    • AlarmSetter

  • public class AlarmSetter
extends Object
    Sets the notification "ALARM" depending on the date of each appointment.
    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static AlarmSetter instance
      This variable is used to promote singleton design pattern.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlarmSetter() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AlarmSetter getInstance()
      Returns instance
      void setAcceptedAppointmentAlarm(Context context, Appointment appointment)
      This method is responsible for setting an "ALARM" in order to notify the user for upcoming appointments.
      void setMissedPendingAppointmentAlarm(Context context, Appointment appointment)
      Sets the appointment status to FINISHED if the appointment date and time has passed and it is neither accepted nor rejected by the consultant.
      void setPendingAppointmentAlarm(Context context, Appointment appointment)
      Reminds consultants to accept or reject a pending appointment 2 days before the appointment date and time.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static AlarmSetter getInstance()
        Returns instance
        Returns:
        returns instance.

      • setAcceptedAppointmentAlarm

        public void setAcceptedAppointmentAlarm(Context context,
                               Appointment appointment)
        This method is responsible for setting an "ALARM" in order to notify the user for upcoming appointments. The "ALARM" is set 1 day before the accepted Appointment date and time.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object from which this method is called
        appointment - an Appointment object which will be passed to the PendingIntent object for the "ALARM"

      • setPendingAppointmentAlarm

        public void setPendingAppointmentAlarm(Context context,
                              Appointment appointment)
        Reminds consultants to accept or reject a pending appointment 2 days before the appointment date and time. This method is called by the consultant only.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object from which this method is called
        appointment - an Appointment object which will be passed to the PendingIntent object for the "ALARM"

      • setMissedPendingAppointmentAlarm

        public void setMissedPendingAppointmentAlarm(Context context,
                                    Appointment appointment)
        Sets the appointment status to FINISHED if the appointment date and time has passed and it is neither accepted nor rejected by the consultant.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object from which this method is called
        appointment - an Appointment object which will be passed to the PendingIntent object for the "ALARM"
